00049 //
00050 // DocListMemoryBuilder.hpp
00051 //
00052 // tds - 17 December 2003
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef LEMUR_KEYFILEDOCLISTMEMORYBUILDER_HPP
00056 #define LEMUR_KEYFILEDOCLISTMEMORYBUILDER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "lemur/RVLCompress.hpp"
00059 #include <vector>
00060 #include <assert.h>
00061 #include "indri/greedy_vector"
00062 
00063 namespace indri {
00064   namespace index {
00065     class DocListMemoryBuilderIterator {
00066       const greedy_vector< std::pair<char*, char*>, 4 >& _lists;
00067       greedy_vector< std::pair<char*, char*>, 4 >::const_iterator _current;
00068 
00069       const char* _list;
00070       const char* _listEnd;
00071 
00072       int _currentDocument;
00073       int _currentPosition;
00074       int _positionsLeft;
00075 
00076     public:
00077       DocListMemoryBuilderIterator( const greedy_vector< std::pair<char*,char*>, 4 >& lists ) :
00078         _lists(lists)
00079       {
00080         _current = _lists.begin();
00081         _currentDocument = 0;
00082         _currentPosition = 0;
00083         _positionsLeft = 0;
00084         _list = 0;
00085         _listEnd = 0;
00086 
00087         if( _current != _lists.end() ) {
00088           _list = _current->first;
00089           _listEnd = _current->second;
00090         }
00091       }
00092 
00093       bool next() {
00094         if( _list < _listEnd ) {
00095           if( _positionsLeft > 0 ) {
00096             // we have more positions left in the current document
00097             int deltaPosition;
00098             _list = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _list, deltaPosition );
00099             _currentPosition += deltaPosition;
00100             _positionsLeft--;
00101             return true;
00102           } else {
00103             // no positions left, but we have more documents to read
00104             int deltaDocument;
00105             _list = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _list, deltaDocument );
00106             _list = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _list, _positionsLeft );
00107             _list = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _list, _currentPosition );
00108             _currentDocument += deltaDocument;
00109             _positionsLeft--;
00110             return true;
00111           }
00112         } else {    
00113           assert( _list == _listEnd );
00114 
00115           // no data left, go to the next segment
00116           if( _current != _lists.end() )
00117             _current++;
00118           
00119           if( _current != _lists.end() ) {
00120             _list = _current->first;
00121             _listEnd = _current->second;
00122             return next();
00123           }
00124 
00125           // no more list segments
00126           return false;
00127         }
00128       }
00129 
00130       int document() {
00131         return _currentDocument;
00132       }
00133 
00134       int position() {
00135         return _currentPosition;
00136       }
00137     };
00138 
00139     class DocListMemoryBuilder {
00140     public:
00141       typedef DocListMemoryBuilderIterator iterator;
00142 
00143     private:
00144       int _documentFrequency;
00145       int _termFrequency;
00146 
00147       greedy_vector< std::pair<char*,char*>, 4 > _lists;
00148 
00149       char* _list;
00150       char* _listBegin;
00151       char* _listEnd;
00152       char* _locationCountPointer;
00153 
00154       int _lastLocation;
00155       int _lastDocument;
00156       int _lastTermFrequency;
00157 
00158       void _storeCompressedInt( std::vector<char>& destination, int data, int previous = 0 );
00159       void _createDocument( int docID );
00160       void _writeLocation( int location );
00161       void _terminateDocument();
00162       void _terminateSegment();
00163       void _grow();
00164       void _copy( DocListMemoryBuilder& other );
00165 
00166     public:
00167       DocListMemoryBuilder();
00168       const DocListMemoryBuilder& operator=( DocListMemoryBuilder& other );
00169       void addLocation( int docID, int location );
00170       void clear();
00171       void close();
00172       iterator getIterator();
00173       bool empty();
00174 
00175       int documentFrequency() const;
00176       int termFrequency() const;
00177       size_t memorySize() const;
00178       int curDocID() const;
00179     };
00180   }
00181 }
